  • Uses of ITask in taskmanagement.application.viewmodel.sort

    Methods in taskmanagement.application.viewmodel.sort that return types with arguments of type ITask
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<ITask>
    SortById.sort(List<ITask> items)
    Returns a new list of tasks sorted by their id in ascending order.
    List<ITask>
    SortByState.sort(List<ITask> items)
    Returns a new list of tasks sorted by state (ToDo < InProgress < Completed), then by case-insensitive title, then by id.
    List<ITask>
    SortByTitle.sort(List<ITask> items)
    Returns a new list of tasks sorted by title (case-insensitive), then by ID.
    List<ITask>
    SortStrategy.sort(List<ITask> items)
    Produces a new list of tasks sorted according to this strategy.

    Classes in taskmanagement.domain that implement ITask
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Task
    Task entity with immutable identity (id), validated fields, and a behavioral state managed by the TaskState state machine.
